title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF linefeeds instead of CR/LF linefeeds on a Windows machine.
OB: Upon using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code contains LF linefeeds on a Windows machine.
EB: The resulting code should contain CR/LF linefeeds instead of just LF linefeeds.
SR: Modify the code assist feature to generate code with CR/LF linefeeds on a Windows machine.
